text: Chip and Joanna Gaines have a new Fixer Upper - based series coming to HGTV. Called Fixer Upper : Behind the Design, the half - hour - long companion project will give fans a peek behind the stars ’ design process as they execute overhauls. The first of the 15 episodes will air on Tuesday, April 10 at 8 p. m. ET / PT. Like subsequent installments, the premiere is scheduled for just after the main Fixer Upper series. Behind the Design will see Joanna meeting with homeowners to learn about their personal style preferences.
